reasoning_log: The matching process involved grouping images by room type (Bathroom, Balcony, Bedroom, Storage/Clutter Room) and then differentiating between highly similar candidates (Images 1/5, 3/4, 6/9, 7/8) based on specific descriptive tags. Image 2 (Bathroom) and Image 10 (Small, orange room) were unique and matched directly to Desc_2 and Desc_10, respectively. For the remaining pairs, the assignment was based on subtle emphasis: Desc_5 explicitly mentioned the AC unit and square layout, aligning slightly better with Image 5's perspective, leaving Desc_1 for Image 1 (emphasizing obstruction). Desc_7 was matched to Image 7 due to the specific mention of '下方收納櫃' (lower cabinets) which are clearly visible, while Desc_8 was assigned to Image 8 (general storage use). The two balcony images (3/4) and two bedroom images (6/9) were assigned sequentially as the descriptions (Desc_3/4 and Desc_6/9) were nearly interchangeable given the visual similarity of the paired images.

matching_result_list.evidence: Cluttered storage room (雜物間) with movement obstructed (動線受阻) and visible old wall texture, matching the need for renovation.
Clearly a bathroom (浴室) with poor cleanliness, old fixtures, and no wet/dry separation, matching all tags.
Narrow balcony (陽台) with clothes drying space, washing machine, and old brick walls, fitting the narrow/long and old wall criteria.
Narrow balcony (陽台) with large drying capacity and old decoration (裝修老舊), visually identical to Image 3 but assigned based on mutual exclusion.
Cluttered room (雜物間) with an AC unit visible (有冷氣設備) and currently full of clutter (目前雜物多).
Well-lit bedroom (臥室) with some furniture (已部分家具) and good overall condition.
Spacious storage room (多功能房) with built-in lower cabinets (已有下方收納櫃) and currently piled high with clutter (flowers).
Storage room (多功能房) with good light and clear storage use (現況為儲物用途), visually identical to Image 7.
Well-lit bedroom (臥室) that appears fully furnished (家具齊全), confirming the room type and condition.
Small, square room with orange walls, lacking a large window (採光不足), simple decoration, and suitable for a small study/storage room.
